title: Project: Triangular Arbitrage in Forex/Crypto
content:
## Exploiting Cross-Rates

Triangular arbitrage involves trading three currencies to exploit discrepancies in their exchange rates.

### The Loop

1.  Start with USD.
2.  Buy EUR (USD -> EUR).
3.  Buy GBP (EUR -> GBP).
4.  Sell GBP for USD (GBP -> USD).

If you end up with more USD than you started (minus fees), you have an arbitrage opportunity. This is very competitive and requires low latency.
